job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Information Services,Information Technology and Services,Computer Networking
job.description: We are working with the Senior manager of a life sciences company that is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) who will be responsible for supporting Linux and Kubernetes based deployments and Google Cloud Platform. Qualifications: At least 3+ years of experience supporting infrastructure and services in public cloud environments (GCP).Demonstrable experience with automation and orchestration to enableAccelerated infrastructure, application and software configuration deploymentAutomated response to alerts or indicators of performance issuesInfrastructure as codeReliability – driving fault detection and correction, performance and uptime at a global scaleObservability – instrument systems to gain visibility and understanding of how systems are performing and detecting anomalous behaviorDeep understanding Linux/Unix system internalsWorking knowledge of network protocols and network based services, including routing, network load balancing and web proxy appliances / applicationsExperience building and supporting containerized application technologies including Docker, kubernetesFamiliarity with CI/CD tools and deployment processes, GitLab a strong preferenceProficient with various programming languages such as Python/Java/Go for building automation or integration with APIsPassion for eliminating repetitive manual processes using automation, including a focus on writing detailed solution specifications, best practices/standards documentation, operating procedures, run books, etc.Hands-on experience with Kafka, Active MQ, IBM MQ, Amazon RDS, Amazon Auroroa desirable.Excellent interpersonal skills, should be capable of working with cross functional technical and business teams and varying levels of management
